text: Eghtɨ ofa gamir gumazim arazir kuraba gɨn amadir ofa me bagh a damightɨ, Israelian gumazamizibar arazir kuraba bar gɨvagham. Ofan kamɨn mɨngarim kamakɨn, marazi deragha nɨghnɨzir puvatɨgha arazir kurabagh ami. Egha bizir kam bangɨn, me uan arazir kuraba gɨn amadir ofa, Ikiavɨra Itir God bagha a gami.
